title: AMBIENT AIR AND COOLING WATER TEMPERATURE
fullText:
Electrical equipment shall be designed to operate satisfactorily under the various temperature parameters indicated in Table 1.

TABLE 1
DESIGN PARAMETERS—TEMPERATURE (From IEC 60092-101)

Parameters	Unit value
°C	
Type of equipment
Relevant Standard	Clause

IEC 60092-301:1980	3.1

IEC 60092-352:2005	3.3.4,
3.3.6	45	Cables
IEC 60092-502:1999	A.2.1.3,
A.3.1.3,
A3.2.3.3	50	Certified safe-type equipment
IEC 60092-504:2001	3.2	55	Control and instrumentation
Low air temperature
		5	General
		–25	Open deck
High water temperature
IEC 60092-301:1980	3.1
(Table A.1)	30	Generators and motors
